sqlReaderQuery.value: select WatermarkValue from watermarktable where TableName='@{item().tableName}'
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', item().tableSchemaName, '.', item().tableName, ' WHERE ', item().WaterMark_Column, ' >= ''', formatDateTime(adddays(utcnow(), -7), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '''')
select WatermarkValue from watermarktable where TableName='@{item().tableName}'
